text: pinnar (marakkalattiliruntu iranki) iruvarum vali natakkalanarkal; (valiyil) oru paiyanai avviruvarum cantitta potu, avar avanaik konru vittar. (Utane musa)"kolaikkurraminri, paricuttamana jivanaik konruvittirkale? Niccayamaka ninkal peruttak ketana oru kariyattaiye ceytu vittirkal!" Enru (musa) kurinar
